Hotel_Address: Riva del Ferro, San Marco, 30124 Venice, Italy
Description: Located in front of Rialto Bridge, Hotel Rialto features a terrace with views of the Grand Canal. It offers traditionally furnished Venetian rooms and suites with satellite TV. Guests at the Rialto can enjoy a continental buffet breakfast while admiring views of the bridge and canal. The rooms and suites all come with air conditioning and a minibar. Some have views of the canal and the bridge. The multilingual staff are available 24 hours a day. Free WiFi is available throughout. The Rialto water-bus stop is outside the hotel and links to Santa Lucia Train Station and Venice Marco Polo Airport. St. Mark’s Square is 600 m away.

Hotel_Address: Calle Priuli Dei Cavaletti 68, Cannaregio, 30121 Venice, Italy
Description: Set in a restored monastery, Hotel Abbazia is in the quiet Cannaregio district of Venice, 100 m from Santa Lucia Train Station. The hotel features a large courtyard garden with bar. The Abbazia's classic rooms all have modern bathroom and include a minibar and satellite TV. Free Wi-Fi internet access is available in the entire hotel. A varied breakfast is served in the garden during the summer, and breakfast room service is also available. The bar and lounge area are situated in the monks’ original wood-panelled dining hall. St. Mark’s Square is 2 km from the hotel and can be reached on foot or by Vaporetto (water bus). The nearest Vaporetto stop to the hotel is Ferrovia, a 5-minute walk away.

Hotel_Address: Calle del Fruttariol - San Marco 1848, San Marco, 30124 Venice, Italy
Description: Just 100 m from La Fenice Theatre and a 5-minute walk to St. Mark's Square, Hotel Mercurio features views of the Barcaroli Canal.  It has elegant rooms with LCD satellite TV. The Mercurio Hotel has been run by the same family for 3 generations. The staff offer a warm welcome and an attentive service. Rooms at the Mercurio are air conditioned and decorated with classical Venetian furnishings. Some rooms offer canal views. A generous buffet breakfast is provided at the San Marco Mercurio, served in guests’ rooms on request. The Giglio vaporetto water bus stop is a 5-minute walk from Hotel Mercurio. The Guggenheim Museum is a 10-minute walk away, across the Ponte dell’Accademia.

Hotel_Address: Cannaregio 3210/a - Calle Dei Riformati, Cannaregio, 30121 Venice, Italy
Description: You're eligible for a Genius discount at Eurostars Residenza Cannaregio! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in. With a quiet location in Venice's Jewish Quarter, Eurostars Residenza Cannaregio is a former monastery. You can walk to Rialto Bridge in 15 minutes, and to St Marks's square in 25 minutes. The cloister of Residenza Cannaregio is now a pretty courtyard and garden where breakfast and drinks are served, or you can simply relax. Each room features a minibar and a TV with satellite and pay-per-view channels. Rooms combine original features such as wood-beamed ceilings with modern amenities like air conditioning and internet access. Some rooms offer views of San Alvise Canal, and some overlook the inner garden. A varied breakfast buffet is available each morning and the bar provides drinks throughout the day. Staff can recommend the best local restaurants for dinner. The property is surrounded by workshops, book stores, and local markets. San Alvise water-bus stop is 200 m away, providing quick links to the train station and the parking in Piazzale Roma.

Hotel_Address: 2264 San Polo, 30125 Venice, Italy
Description: You're eligible for a Genius discount at Ca' Dada Appartamento! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in. Located in Venice, 500 m from Scuola Grande di San Rocco and 400 m from Frari Basilica, Ca' Dada Appartamento provides air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. This apartment is 1.4 km from Ca' d'Oro and 1.4 km from Doge's Palace. The apartment features 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a microwave and a fridge, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a bidet. Towels and bed linen are provided. Popular points of interest near the apartment include Venice Santa Lucia Train Station, La Fenice Theatre and Piazza San Marco. The nearest airport is Venice Marco Polo Airport, 13 km from Ca' Dada Appartamento.

Hotel_Address: San Marco  5109, San Marco, 30124 Venice, Italy
Description: Just 100 m from the Rialto Bridge, Cà Rialto is an intimate structure with traditional Venetian styling. It offers elegant rooms with satellite TV and private bathrooms. Decorated with flock wallpapers and luxurious fabrics, rooms at the Cà Rialto Residence are all air conditioned. Each comes with a minibar. Piazza San Marco is 500 m from the property. The Rialto vaporetto water bus stop is a 1-minute walk away.

Hotel_Address: Castello 5487 San Lio, Castello, 30122 Venice, Italy
Description: Hotel Canaletto is near San Lio Church, in the heart of Venice. The elegant building was once home of the famous Canaletto painter. The Rialto Bridge is 200 m away. Piazza San Marco is within walking distance. The vaporetto (water bus) connects you quickly and easily to Santa Lucia Station and the public car parks of Tronchetto or Piazzale Roma. Hotel Canaletto offers Wi-Fi access in its elegant rooms in Venetian style. Some rooms offer views of a typical square or views of the canal. A buffet breakfast is served in 2 elegant dining rooms. You can also enjoy a drink in the outdoor tables. To reach the Canaletto take water bus 2, in the direction of Rialto, and get off at the Rialto stop. The hotel is a 5-minute from the stop.

Hotel_Address: S. Croce 927, Santa Croce, 30135 Venice, Italy
Description: Set directly on the Grand Canal just a few hundred metres from Venice’s Santa Lucia train station, Ca’ Nigra Lagoon Resort is unique for a Venetian hotel. It offers free WiFi throughout and a spacious garden on the canal. Ca’ Nigra’s dates back to the 17th century and will enchant you with its frescoed walls and historic Venetian feel. Air-conditioned rooms come with modern decor, satellite TVs and minibars. Some rooms include a spa bath. Guests will enjoy a sweet and savoury breakfast every morning. It includes hot drinks and fruit juice, croissants, fresh fruit, jam, homemade cakes, eggs and cheese. Saint Mark's Square and Fenice Theatre are within 2 km of the property. Rialto Bridge is a 15-minute walk away.

Hotel_Address: Riva de l'Ogio, San Polo, 30125 Venice, Italy

The property is close to popular attractions like Venice Santa Lucia Train Station, Frari Basilica and Scuola Grande di San Rocco. At the guest house, the rooms include a desk, bed linen and a patio with a city view. All rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle. Popular points of interest near Residenza La Veranda a Rialto include Piazza San Marco, Church of San Giorgio Maggiore and La Fenice Theatre. The nearest airport is Venice Marco Polo Airport, 13 km from the accommodation.

Hotel_Name: Castello Appartamento con vista sul Canale x6

Hotel_Address: Via Garibaldi 1776, Castello, 30122 Venice, Italy

Hotel_Address: Calle de la Racheta, Cannaregio, 30121 Venice, Italy

Hotel_Address: Campo SS. Filippo e Giacomo - Castello 4365, Castello, 30122 Venice, Italy

Hotel_Address: San Polo Campiello del Figher 803, San Polo, 30125 Venice, Italy

Hotel_Address: 3478 Castello, Castello, 30122 Venice, Italy

Hotel_Address: Calle Goldoni 4488, San Marco, 30124 Venice, Italy
Description: You're eligible for a Genius discount at Hotel Bonvecchiati! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in. Rooms are individually designed in a classic Venetian or a modern style. Each room has free WiFi, air conditioning, satellite TV, and a private bathroom with bathrobe and slippers. Meals are accompanied by a wide selection of wines from the on site wine cellar. This 4-star hotel is decorated with fresh flowers throughout. Hotel_Address: Calle del Tragheto della Madoneta, 1434, San Polo, 30125 Venice, Italy

Ca' Angeli has just 6 rooms, all of which feature classic décor, LCD satellite TV and Wi-Fi access. The continental breakfast includes organic products.. There is a small library and a lounge with antique furniture at Ca' Angeli.

Hotel_Name: Hotel La Fenice et Des Artistes
Hotel_Address: S. Marco 1936, San Marco, 30124 Venice, Italy
Description: You're eligible for a Genius discount at Hotel La Fenice et Des Artistes! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in. It offers air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom, free WiFi throughout, and a small shared courtyard. Hotel La Fenice et Des Artistes is ideally placed to visit Venice's most famous attractions. The Rialto Bridge and market are 700 m away, and it is a 10-minute walk to the Zattere for boats across to Giudecca. Set in 2 buildings, the hotel comprises the original town house, and a newer wing. All rooms come with satellite TV and a minibar. Some rooms overlook the rooftops of Venice and feature classic furnishings. La Fenice serves a simple breakfast, with cereals, pastries and fruit jams. The La Taverna restaurant specialises in traditional Venetian cuisine, and hotel guests are entitled to special discounts on meals.

Hotel_Address: Lista di Spagna 152, Cannaregio, 30121 Venice, Italy

Hotel_Address: Cannaregio 5619, Cannaregio, 30121 Venice, Italy
Description: Hotel Al Vagon is located just 5 minutes’ walk from the Rialto Bridge. It offers a 24-hour reception. All rooms feature a TV with satellite channels. The hotel is 10 minutes’ walk from St. Mark’s Square and 1.5 km from Venezia Santa Lucia Train Station.

Hotel_Address: Salizada San Geremia, 324, Cannaregio, 30121 Venice, Italy
Description: You're eligible for a Genius discount at B&B Sognare A Venezia! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in. Hotel_Name: La Perla del Doge con Wellness & Spa uso esclusivo

Hotel_Address: San Marco, Calle dei Fabbri 4680, San Marco, 30124 Venice, Italy
Description: You're eligible for a Genius discount at Hotel Palace Bonvecchiati! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in. Located just 250 m from Venice’s Saint Mark's Square, Hotel Palace Bonvecchiati offers contemporary rooms with elegant furniture and air conditioning. With free WiFi throughout, each room at the Bonvecchiati is spacious and well equipped with a minibar, bathrobe and slippers and TV with satellite channels. The property features an on-site bar that serves hot and cold snacks throughout the day. Breakfast and other meals are served at La Terrazza restaurant at a partner hotel next door. Guests can relax in the wellness centre, available at an extra cost, which includes a Turkish bath and sauna. A free fitness area is also offered. The Rialto vaporetto water bus stop is  just 200 m from Hotel Palace Bonvecchiati, linking to Santa Lucia Train Station and other major sites.

Hotel_Address: San Marco Calle dei Fabbri 848, San Marco, 30124 Venice, Italy
Description: You're eligible for a Genius discount at Royal San Marco Hotel! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in. Looking for an elegant setting for your stay in Venice? Naturally you'd like to be near St. Mark's Square. Royal San Marco Hotel is a 3-minute walk from the basilica. Set in one of the finest, ancient buildings of Venice, this charming hotel boasts fine décor and antique furnishings, which really set the scene. Royal San Marco Hotel is located just behind the city's most famous square on a characteristic narrow street. Here you will find typical shops selling just about everything from Murano glass to Venetian masks. The professional team of staff are always at hand to provide valuable tourist information and tips and recommendations to get the most out of your time in Venice. Your day begins with a rich and varied breakfast buffet, which is available until 10:30. Opposite the hotel you will find a cosy café and stylish American bar, all under the same ownership. Just a little further along the road you will come across the hotel's prestigious La Colomba restaurant, which is also a popular venue for international art exhibitions.

Hotel_Address: Santa Croce 467 - Rio Terà Sant'Andrea, Santa Croce, 30135 Venice, Italy
Description: Located in Venice's historic centre and featuring private parking, Cà Doge offers spacious, soundproofed rooms with free WiFi, Waterbuses to St Mark's Square stop in front of the property, as does the People Mover to the harbour. With air conditioning and heating, all rooms at the Doge have a classic décor and parquet floors. Each has a flat-screen satellite TV and minibar. Cà Doge is located less than a 10-minute walk from Santa Lucia Train Station and a 15-minute drive from Venice Marco Polo Airport.

Hotel_Address: Calle della Verona, 3673, San Marco, 30124 Venice, Italy
Description: You're eligible for a Genius discount at Hotel Ca' Alvise! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in. The Sant'Angelo water-bus stop is a 5-minute walk from the hotel, and water taxis can take you right in front of the door. Rialto Brigde is 600 m away.

Hotel_Address: Cannaregio Ss. Apostoli 4587, Cannaregio, 30121 Venice, Italy
Description: You're eligible for a Genius discount at Hotel Giorgione! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in. The elegant rooms feature precious fabrics and Murano-glass chandeliers. They combine period furniture with modern amenities, such as an LCD TV with satellite channels. WiFi is free throughout. The rich breakfast buffet includes freshly baked croissants, eggs and bacon. During summer, it is served in the very characteristic courtyard with fountain. The property also boasts an outdoor seasonal pool, hot tub and solarium. Located in the Cannaregio district, Giorgione Hotel is a 15-minute walk from St Mark’s Square, the Doge’s Palace.

Hotel_Address: Castello 2135/A, Castello, 30122 Venice, Italy

The Bucintoro Hotel is just across the bridge from the Vaporetto (water bus) stop, Arsenale. Accommodation here comes with air conditioning, satellite TV, and free Wi-Fi. Each room boasts a great view that includes Saint Mark's Square, Palazzo Ducale, the Campanile, and the Island of San Giorgio. Hotel Bucintoro is set in the historic district of Castello, a 10-minute walk from Saint Mark's Square. The area is still full of small neighbourhood shops, cafés and Venetian inns.

Hotel_Address: Calle Larga, San Marco 367, San Marco, 30124 Venice, Italy
Description: You're eligible for a Genius discount at Hotel Concordia! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in. The bathrooms are in marble and hard stone. The Beggiato family have owned the Concordia for 4 generations.

Hotel_Address: San Marco 403, San Marco, 30124 Venice, Italy

Hotel_Address: Sestiere San Polo - Riva de L Ogio 1777, San Polo, 30125 Venice, Italy

Hotel_Address: San Marco 2711 Calle Dose da Ponte, San Marco, 30124 Venice, Italy

Hotel_Address: Calle Degli Specchieri 646, San Marco, 30124 Venice, Italy

Hotel_Address: San Marco, 463 - Calle Specchieri, San Marco, 30124 Venice, Italy

Hotel_Address: Castello, 4981/B, Castello, 30122 Venice, Italy
Description: You're eligible for a Genius discount at Palazzo San Lorenzo! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in. Located in Venice. Hotel_Name: Hotel Danieli, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Venice

All rooms at Sina Palazzo Sant'Angelo feature a spacious marble bathroom with hydromassage bath. Rooms offer views of the canal or the courtyard with garden. A generous buffet breakfast is served in a wood-panelled room with silk wall coverings and large windows overlooking a typical Venetian canal. Bar service is available all day. Formerly a private residence, the hotel boasts a hall overlooking the Canal Grande, decorated with precious tapestry and magnificent Palladian floors. The nearest water bus stop is Sant'Angelo.

Hotel_Address: Dorsoduro, 173, Dorsoduro, 30123 Venice, Italy
Description: You're eligible for a Genius discount at Sina Centurion Palace! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in. Overlooking the Grand Canal, next to the Basilica of Chiesa of Santa Maria della Salute, Centurion Palace offers 5-star luxury in Venice. Drinks are served in the hotel's private courtyard. Dating back to 1892, the property combines contemporary interiors with original décor. Guests have a modern gym and a private dock for arrivals by water taxi. Salute Vaporetto (water bus) stop is right outside. Rooms are elegantly decorated in neutral colours with wood-beamed ceilings and wood floors. All air-conditioned, the rooms also feature a minibar and flat-screen TV. Each one has a modern bathroom with a bathrobe and slippers. Centurion Palace serves a large buffet breakfast with both sweet and savoury items. These include eggs, smoked salmon, cheeses and a selection of fresh fruit. Antinoo's Restaurant offers gourmet cuisine and Grand Canal views.

Hotel_Address: San Marco 951, San Marco, 30124 Venice, Italy
Description: You're eligible for a Genius discount at Rosa Salva Hotel! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in. Rosa Salva Hotel is one of the most historic hotels in Venice, and is set just 100 m from St. Mark's Square. It offers basic, spacious rooms with a private bathroom. The hotel serves a varied buffet breakfast. Staff will be delighted to share local knowledge and offer recommendations for the best places to eat and drink. WiFi access is available throughout the hotel. The Rosa Salva Hotel is easily reached by water bus, making it easy to get to and from Santa Lucia Train Station and Piazzale Roma.

Hotel_Address: Castello 4358-4358/A (Campo SS. Filippo e Giacomo), Castello, 30122 Venice, Italy
Description: You're eligible for a Genius discount at Hotel Rio! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in. Hotel Rio is located in the centre of Venice, just 250 m from Saint Mark’s Square. Free WiFi access is available in all areas. Each room here will provide you with a satellite flat-screen TV, air conditioning and an electric kettle. Featuring a shower, the private bathroom also comes with towels, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Hotel Rio you will find a mini-market. Other facilities offered at the property include a shared lounge, luggage storage and shops (on site). Rialto Bridge is a 10-minute walk from the property. Venezia Santa Lucia Train Station is 2.5 km away.

Hotel_Address: S.Marco 2462, San Marco, 30124 Venice, Italy
Description: You're eligible for a Genius discount at Palazzo del Giglio! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in. Palazzo del Giglio is set in the heart of Venice, just a 5-minute walk from Saint Mark's Square. It overlooks the picturesque square of Santa Maria del Giglio. All rooms come with satellite TV and air conditioning. Each room is elegantly decorated with period furniture. Some units also feature a hot tub. A buffet breakfast of cereals, fresh fruit and croissants is served in the café with views of the square. Staff at Palazzo del Giglio can provide useful tourist information and book gondola rides around the famous canals of Venice.

Hotel_Address: Calle Priuli Dei Cavaletti 68, Cannaregio, 30121 Venice, Italy
Description: Set in a restored monastery, Hotel Abbazia is in the quiet Cannaregio district of Venice, 100 m from Santa Lucia Train Station. The hotel features a large courtyard garden with bar. The Abbazia's classic rooms all have modern bathroom and include a minibar and satellite TV. Free Wi-Fi internet access is available in the entire hotel. A varied breakfast is served in the garden during the summer, and breakfast room service is also available. The bar and lounge area are situated in the monks’ original wood-panelled dining hall. St. Mark’s Square is 2 km from the hotel and can be reached on foot or by Vaporetto (water bus). The nearest Vaporetto stop to the hotel is Ferrovia, a 5-minute walk away.

Hotel_Address: Calle del Fruttariol - San Marco 1848, San Marco, 30124 Venice, Italy
Description: Just 100 m from La Fenice Theatre and a 5-minute walk to St. Mark's Square, Hotel Mercurio features views of the Barcaroli Canal.  It has elegant rooms with LCD satellite TV. The Mercurio Hotel has been run by the same family for 3 generations. The staff offer a warm welcome and an attentive service. Rooms at the Mercurio are air conditioned and decorated with classical Venetian furnishings. Some rooms offer canal views. A generous buffet breakfast is provided at the San Marco Mercurio, served in guests’ rooms on request. The Giglio vaporetto water bus stop is a 5-minute walk from Hotel Mercurio. The Guggenheim Museum is a 10-minute walk away, across the Ponte dell’Accademia.

Hotel_Address: San Marco 877 (Calle dei Fabbri), San Marco, 30124 Venice, Italy
Description: Just a few steps from Venice's San Marco Square and Doge's Palace, Albergo San Marco offers a restaurant and air-conditioned rooms. Free WiFi is available. Rooms at the San Marco include satellite TV and a minibar. The private bathroom has free toiletries and a hairdryer. Guests can enjoy drinks at the cocktail bar and both Italian and international cuisine in 1 of the 2 restaurants. The hotel's second restaurant opens straight out on to the square. The staff are at your service 24-hours a day. There are business facilities available and a WiFi point. Get around Venice with ease by Vaporetto water bus, connecting you to Santa Lucia Station.

Hotel_Address: Cannaregio 539/b, Cannaregio, 30121 Venice, Italy
Description: You're eligible for a Genius discount at Alberghiera Venezia! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in. Set in the Cannaregio district of Venice, Alberghiera Venezia offers air-conditioned rooms and apartments with wood-beamed ceilings and some with canal views. Venezia Santa Lucia Train Station is a 9-minute walk away. The Vaporetto (water bus) to Saint Mark's Square stops just 700 m from the property. The Jewish Quarter is just a 10-minute walk away. Rooms and apartments are located on the ground or first floor, and some are suitable for disabled guests. They feature wood floors and elegant contemporary furniture. Apartments include a fully equipped kitchenette with microwave. Buses to Marco Polo Airport leave from Piazzale Roma, 1 km away. Santa Lucia Station is a short walk away, without having to cross any bridges.

Hotel_Address: Riva degli Schiavoni 4182, Castello, 30122 Venice, Italy
Description: You're eligible for a Genius discount at Hotel Paganelli! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in. Enjoy clean rooms, a welcoming atmosphere, friendly staff and a central location at Hotel Paganelli, which is within easy walking distance of the Bridge of Sighs and Saint Mark’s Square. Set in a former convent, Hotel Paganelli offers a stylish setting. Relax in the sophisticated lobby, or have some refreshments at the bar. The roof garden offers stunning views of Venice. Stay in luxurious rooms in the main building or in the annex, which is just 25 m from Hotel Paganelli. Annex rooms feature modern and art-dèco decorations and renovated antique ceilings. Savour the hotel’s free breakfast in the comfortable dining area, or enjoy breakfast room service at an additional cost. Hotel Paganelli is located near vaporetto stations (public water buses). Friendly staff can provide tourist information, suggest nearby restaurants and recommend evening entertainment.

Hotel_Address: San Marco 2494 - Campo Santa Maria Del Giglio, San Marco, 30124 Venice, Italy
Description: UNAHOTELS Ala Venezia-Adults 16 is set in a quiet square, 40 m from Santa Maria del Giglio vaporetto stop and 500 m from Saint Mark's Square. Rooms are elegantly furnished and offer LCD TVs with satellite channels. Free high speed internet access is available throughout. Located in an early 18th-century building, with typical Venetian decorations, many of the Ala Hotel's rooms overlook a canal or a typical square. All are air conditioned and have a minibar, 2 complimentary bottles of water and tea/coffee-making facilities. The property also offers a terrace. A buffet breakfast is served daily and after a day exploring Venice, guests can enjoy a drink in the American bar. A variety of classic Italian restaurants are available just a short walk away.
